Package shared.filt

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataSetFilter
    A filter for a data set
    ReversibleFilter
    A reversible filter is a filter that can be undone
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContinuousToDiscreteFilter
    A continuous to discrete filter
    DiscreteDistributionFilter
    A filter that replaces data with a class distribution from a classifier
    DiscreteToBinaryFilter
    A filter that changes attributes from discrete to binary
    IndependentComponentAnalysis
    A filter for performing ICA on data
    InsignificantComponentAnalysis
    A filter that performs PCA on a set of data and then keeps the smallest eigenvalues instead of the largest
    kFoldSplitFilter
    A filter that supports k-fold splitting of a dataset for cross validation
    LabelFilter
    A filter that applies a filter to the label data set
    LabelSelectFilter
    A filter that selects a specified value as the label.
    LabelSplitFilter
    A filter that splits a data set into data and labels
    LinearDiscriminantAnalysis
    A filter that performs fisher linear discriminant analysis on a data set
    PrincipalComponentAnalysis
    A filter that performs PCA on a set of data
    RandomizedProjectionFilter
    A filter that performs a random projection
    RandomOrderFilter
    A filter for randomizing the order of a data set
    TestTrainSplitFilter  
    VarianceCounter
    A helper class used in PCA and other dimensionality reduction filters.
